title: "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."

replies.body:
This error usually pops up when there's an issue with your connection reaching out servers. This can often be resolved by working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it covers some common conflicting network settings. 

Let me know if those steps helped.
